games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: An action-adventure game set in an open world environment, where players control Link, who awakens from a long slumber to defeat Calamity Ganon before it can destroy the kingdom of Hyrule.

games.name: The Last of Us Part II
games.description: A sequel to the critically acclaimed The Last of Us, following Ellie's journey through a post-apocalyptic United States as she seeks revenge against a cult.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: A Western-themed action-adventure game set in an open world environment, following the story of Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang.

games.name: Super Mario Odyssey
games.description: A 3D platformer where Mario sets out on a globe-trotting adventure to save Princess Peach from Bowser's forced marriage plans.

games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification. You play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.

games.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: An action role-playing game set in an open world environment, players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter known as a Witcher, searching for his missing adopted daughter.

games.name: Halo: Infinite
games.platform: Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PC
games.description: The next installment in the iconic Halo series, featuring Master Chief as he confronts the most ruthless foe he's ever faced.

games.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
games.description: A tactical shooter game where players assume control of an operator from the Rainbow team, a counter-terrorism unit. The game features intense close-quarters combat and a heavy emphasis on environmental destruction and team coordination.

bestSellers.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
bestSellers.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PC
bestSellers.description: An action role-playing game set in the Viking Age, players control Eivor, a Viking raider, as they lead their clan to settle in England.

bestSellers.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
bestSellers.description: A free-to-play battle royale game set in the Call of Duty universe, featuring up to 150 players competing in squads to be the last team standing.

bestSellers.name: FIFA 22
bestSellers.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PC
bestSellers.description: A football simulation video game, featuring various game modes including career mode, ultimate team, and VOLTA football.

bestSellers.name: Grand Theft Auto V
bestSellers.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3, Xbox One, Xbox 360, PC
bestSellers.description: An action-adventure game set in the fictional state of San Andreas, players follow three criminals as they plan and execute a series of heists.

bestSellers.name: Mortal Kombat 11
bestSellers.platform: PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PC
bestSellers.description: A fighting game featuring a roster of iconic characters from the Mortal Kombat series, known for its brutal combat and fatalities.

bestSellers.name: Overwatch
bestSellers.description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter game, players select from a diverse cast of heroes and work together to complete objectives.

bestSellers.name: Fortnite
bestSellers.platform: PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PC, Mobile
bestSellers.description: A battle royale game where players fight to be the last one standing, featuring building mechanics and regular updates with new content.

bestSellers.name: Doom Eternal
bestSellers.description: A first-person shooter game, players assume the role of the Doom Slayer as they battle demonic forces from Hell across multiple dimensions.

bestSellers.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
bestSellers.platform: PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PC
bestSellers.description: An action role-playing game set in the fantasy world of Tamriel, players explore an open world filled with quests, dungeons, and dragons.

bestSellers.name: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
bestSellers.description: An action-adventure game set in Marvel's New York City, players control Miles Morales as he masters his new powers and becomes Spider-Man.

bestSellers.name: Monster Hunter: World
bestSellers.description: An action role-playing game where players hunt down monsters in diverse environments, crafting gear from their remains.

bestSellers.name: Pokémon Sword and Shield
bestSellers.description: Role-playing games set in the Galar region, players embark on a journey to become the Champion while capturing and battling Pokémon.

bestSellers.name: Destiny 2
bestSellers.description: An online multiplayer first-person shooter game, players assume the role of Guardians, protectors of Earth's last safe city.

bestSellers.name: The Sims 4
bestSellers.description: A life simulation game, players create and control virtual people, build houses, and fulfill their needs and aspirations.

bestSellers.name: League of Legends
bestSellers.description: A multiplayer online battle arena game, players control a 'champion' with unique abilities and battle against a team of other players.

bestSellers.name: Diablo III
bestSellers.description: An action role-playing game set in the dark fantasy world of Sanctuary, players battle demons and other creatures while collecting loot.

bestSellers.name: World of Warcraft
bestSellers.description: A massively multiplayer online role-playing game, players explore the world of Azeroth, completing quests and battling monsters.

bestSellers.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
bestSellers.description: A crossover fighting game featuring characters from various video game franchises, players battle in iconic arenas to be the last one standing.

bestSellers.name: NBA 2K22
bestSellers.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PC
bestSellers.description: A basketball simulation video game, featuring various game modes including MyCareer, MyTeam, and MyLeague.

bestSellers.name: Resident Evil Village
bestSellers.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PC
bestSellers.description: A survival horror game, players control Ethan Winters as he searches for his kidnapped daughter in a mysterious village.
